metadata.title: CVE-2018-10242 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Suricata version 4.0.4 incorrectly handles the parsing of the SSH banner. Amalformed SSH banner can cause the parsing code to read beyond theallocated data because SSHParseBanner in app-layer-ssh.c lacks a lengthcheck.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10242` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 1:4.0.0-1
suricata-oinkmaster - 1:4.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.0.0-1').
